amendment.description: Amendment increases the appropriation to the Department of Labor in order to fight sweatshop violations in the garment industry.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the appropriations in the bill from the Jobs Training Partnership program by $5 million and to transfer the funds to the Wage and Hour enforcement Division of the Department of Labor for increase enforcement against sweatshops in the garment industry.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Velazquez amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
